definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="explode"><field name="mode">DESTROY</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">120</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="spawn_xporb"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="xpamount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">FALSE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BottleOfDisulfide</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:GoBoom</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
